entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 7:10 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Wind Chill: -8
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
